meaningMnemonic: If you look for a <radical>leaf</radical> among the <radical>hills</radical> you will notice they are <kanji>scarce</kanji>. The hills have no trees around them, so there are no leaves. The leaves are scarce here on the hills.
readingMnemonic: Still looking for a leaf, you determine that they are far too <kanji>scarce</kanji> to find here. Just before you give up, you discover a giant <reading>bow</reading>ling (ぼう) ball. As you pick it up, another one comes thundering down the hill knocking over a tiny tree.
